BREAST-COMPOSITION: fibro fatty and glandular breast parenchyma (ACR C)
FINDINGS: a large well-defined irregular soft opacity seen in the lower quadrant of the breast suggest a probably benign lesion (BIRADS 3). multiple foci of fine linear/branching and amorphous microcalcifications seen in the lower quadrant of the breast. (BIRADS 4c)skin, nipple, and pectoral muscle appear normal. no significant axillary adenopathy seen.BIRADS: 3, 4c
